name: Teremok Marine

reviews.text: If you are staying in Durban or the area, this place is perfect. Lovely pool, fantastic service, amazing rooms. Get Milkwood Suite or Durban View. Nice touches like walk in showers and candles by the baths, and the honesty bar. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the most wonderful stay in Teremok. I should actually tell other people about this, because when we wanted to return they were fully booked and we had to book somewhere else which was very disappointing. The breakfast is different every morning, the managers are wonderful, I cannot fault them on anything. We had the Vladikow room which I think is the best room in the house. We will return definitely and can recommend to anyone.
reviews.title: The Perfect Getaway

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went on honeymoon, and have to say this is one of the nicest places we have ever stayed in. We recommend the Durban View suite.
reviews.title: Honeymoon at Teremok...
Teremok Lodge - an idilic hideaway
reviews.text: The staff (especially Stanley) were marvellous - we came home from dinner one night to find Stanley had covered the floor of our room with tea lights and rose petals...along with a bottle of champagne on ice!

description: Situated in the heart of Umhlanga, and walking distance from the beach, lies Teremok Marine, an award-winning five-star boutique lodge and spa. All eight suites are uniquely designed and boast extra-length beds, air-conditioning, private balconies, showers, baths, double basins and separate toilets with bidets. Extras include LCD screens and DVD players, iPod docking stations, and complimentary ADSL internet in every room. Teremok also has a Spa facility, gym and pool.
